Summary: I saw 3 reddish lights hovering over the horizen, followed by 5 for about 10 minutes
divs: sighting details i exited my house at approxamatly 0230 on december 12,2010 looking east, and i saw three reddish\orange dots in the eastern sky. the position of these dots would form the corners of a triangle with the two corners on the bottom, a single on top, plus the objects seemed to be motionless at the time. i proceeded to start yelling for anyone that could help verify, but unfortunatley no one responded at this time. suddenly the bottom right dot started to move toward the upper right dot while the left dot remainded stationary. the two dots then came close together when the whole formation seemed to head east, and that is when i finaly ran inside and summonded friend #1 who came to see the end of the first event pluse the second event also. friend #1 and i together witnessed the three lights disappear in the east in the formation specified...this concludes the first event. following the first event, friend#1 and i discussed the options and possibilites of what we has just witnessed for a little while before he decided to retire inside while i still watched the early morning sky. after about 30 minutes lights once again graced the eastern sky....i summoned friend#1 and he summoned friend#2 who would be the third witness to tonights events. the second event consisted of five objects in the eastern sky positioned side by side each other, slightly above the horizen with 2 of the objects on the right being very close to each other. i believe this was object number 2and3 counting from the right. once again the objects seemed to be stationary at first then they slowly disappeared in the eastern sky after several minutes. this was witnessed by myself, friend#1, and friend#2. it is now 04:24am on 12\12\2010. i just came back inside from checking again for the lights, but with no sign of the objects in question i retired inside for the rest of the morning. venus has risen in the eastern sky, but from where i spotted the objects they would have been to the left\north of venus.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There was one other sighting in Bradenton on or around December 12th 2010
